key.name: sort-type
key.description: This chooses the means by which the list of active windows will be sorted

key.name: show-icons
key.description: Shows application icon next to the window title in the menu

key.name: menu-placement-position
key.description: An integer value determining where the menu is placed in the left box of the top panel

key.name: max-title-length
key.summary: Max length of title for menu item
key.description: Determines the length beyond which a window title will be truncated and appended with an elipsis
